titles.title: Humanity and Pets Partnered Through the Years (HAPPY) Act
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for pet care expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 7/31/2009--Introduced. Humanity and Pets Partnered Through the Years (HAPPY) Act - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a tax deduction, up to $3,500 per year, for pet care expenses (including veterinary care).
